news.title: SC reserves verdict on sale of unused FAR of Amrapali projects
news.para: The Noida and Greater Noida authorities have opposed the sale of the unused FAR while court receiver and attorney general R Venkataramani has supported it saying it will help in generating funds for the stalled projects of the group.

news.title: Dalmia Bharat's profit falls 77% to Rs 47 crore in Q2 FY23
news.para: Its revenue from operations increased 15.11 per cent to Rs 2,971 crore in the second quarter of the current fiscal. In the year-ago period, the same stood at Rs 2,581 crore.

news.title: China Evergrande unit gets notice for $4.48 billion loan from Shengjing Bank
news.para: The bank said it failed to recover funds totalling 32.595 billion yuan ($4.48 billion), which was provided to the unit from 2020 to 2021, according to Evergrande.

news.title: PM inaugurates 3,024 newly constructed flats for EWS in Delhi
news.para: The in-situ slum rehabilitation in 376 Jhuggi-Jhopri clusters is being undertaken by the Delhi Development Authority (DDA) in line with the prime minister's vision to provide housing for all, it said.

news.title: Delhi CM announces Rs 5,000 aid to workers amid ban on construction activities
news.para: "Construction activities have been stopped across Delhi in view of pollution. I have directed Labour Minister, Sh Manish Sisodia, to give Rs 5,000 pm as financial support to each construction worker during this period when construction activities are not permitted," Kejriwal tweeted.

news.title: Can't differentiate between areas under Lutyens Bungalow Zone, Centre tells Delhi HC
news.para: Appearing for the Centre before justice Yashwant Varma, additional solicitor general (ASG) Sanjay Jain opposed a plea to de-link Gole Market and Bengali Market areas from other posh localities such as Sundar Nagar, Golf Links and Jor Bag on the issue of inclusion in LBZ.

news.title: RERA scam in Kalyan: Out of 65 developers, bank accounts of 40 frozen
news.para: The SIT has also asked land revenue and other departments to stop the transfer of land or flats of these developers since the constructed building is illegal and is constructed using forged documents.

news.title: Kajaria Ceramics' net profit dips 42.26% in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 1,085.39 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of 10.69 per cent from Rs 980.57 crore it recorded in the similar quarter of the last year.

news.title: Kansai Nerolac Paints' net profit up 27.42% in Q2 FY23
news.para: The company's net consolidated income stood at Rs 1,935.03 crore in Q2 FY23, a growth of 19 per cent from Rs 1,626.12 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Thiruvananthapuram: Dissent over writing off tax dues of demolished buildings
news.para: The agenda on cancellation of tax dues and removal of buildings from the demand register was regarding two buildings in Chalai ward and one building in Kalady ward. The file was forwarded from the Fort zonal office.

news.title: Kolkata civic body starts drive to pull down illegal buildings
news.para: A KMC buildings department official said municipal commissioner Binod Kumar has empowered the civic body’s executive engineers to exercise a special power vested on him and asked them to supervise the demolition drive in their respective boroughs.

news.title: Mumbai: BMC stays its proposal to hike rent of civic-owned properties
news.para: There are close to 3,500 BMC owned properties in the city. The last hike was implemented back in the year 2014 following which, in 2021, the BMC had floated a proposal of increasing the rates to Rs 3 per square feet.

news.title: Ludhiana civic body chief raps officials over illegal buildings, pending NOCs
news.para: The municipal town planner has been told to review recovery status daily with assistant town planners and to take strict action against illegal structures.

news.title: Goa-SEIAA fines builder Rs 50 lakh for starting project without EC
news.para: The authority has laid down the condition that the project proponent shall not make any change in the surface layout plan or civil plan submitted to Goa-SEIAA without its prior permission.

news.title: Sebi fines 21 entities for manipulating share price of Sunstar Realty Development
news.para: Sebi conducted an investigation in the scrip of Sunstar Realty Development Ltd (SRDL) during June 2015 to March 2016 to ascertain whether there were any violations of the PFUTP (Prohibition of Fraudulent and Unfair Trade Practices) rules.
